main event: A military officer reported observing a white circular object with bright lights over the Mid-Atlantic on June 28, 1958.
interesting points: The object was circular and bright white, appearing smaller than a star., The object was observed to have a distinct, pulsating light., It disintegrated after a few seconds of observation., The sighting was reported by a pilot flying at 21,000 ft., There were initial reports of multiple objects before disintegration.
sighted object: a circular bright white object with pulsating light
witness description: Military officer who reported the sighting.
